Name: Satan's Whiskers (Enroulée)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Enroulée is the French word for 'curled' and this version of the classic Satan's Whiskers is "curled" by the use of mandarine liqueur in place of the Grand Marnier found in the 'straight' version.
History: Created in 2011 by Gary "gaz" Regan , New York, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Satan's Whiskers (Enroulée) contains 190 calories
